title: ICRC 1983
creator_credit: International Committee of the Red Cross
brief_description: Provides an overview of the work that was carried out world wide by the Red Cross in 1983. Shows volunteers and delegates at work in Africa, Poland, Middle East, Thailand, South America and Granada.
